item.title: Verona Family - Crime Syndicate
item.description: The Verona family is a well connected merchant family. There are rumors that the family makes money primarily on the smuggling of illegal goods as well as acting as enforcers in locations heavily under their control.

item.title: United Crafters - Multidisciplinary Trade Guild
item.description: The United Crafters is an amalgam of other more specific trade guilds that work to both control prices and ensure quality among crafters. A craftsman with a UC seal of approval is considered both skillful and fair in price.

item.title: Plousies Skies - Thieves Guild
item.description: Sometimes working under the pseudonym ‚ÄúPlush Skies‚Äù, the thieves guild helps connect thieves and burglars with each other and with fences. They have branches in most major cities and enforce an honor among thieves mindset.

item.title: Aasimar and Teiflings
item.description: Two halves of the same coin, aasimar and teiflings both show up randomly across all other races. Aasimar are believed to show up as descedants of those who did great and holy works or served a god as part of a pact.

item.title: Dragonborn
item.description: Believing themselves to be descendants of dragons, or at least cousins, dragonborn have a great respect for both dragons and .

item.title: Dwarves
item.description: A people without a home. Originally travelers from an unknown world to which they cannot return, many dwarves search mountains and caves in the hope of finding a place to call their own.

item.title: Elves
item.description: Have long maintained some minor magical prowess, which has left many to be suspicious of them. Elves are long lived, living to be about 500 years old.
